characters.introStart: I didn't know there was an officer with knowledge of the killer. I'll go ask him some questions
characters.name: James O'Donell

intro.question: Excuse me, sir. Are you a certain James O’Donell?
segments: The one and only. What can I do for you on this fine day?

intro.question: An acquaintance mentioned your name. I’d like to know about the murders happening around the gay bars.
segments: Cutting to the chase, eh?  But why should I tell you what I know?

intro.question: Randy Jurgensen, NYPD. I’m sure you’ll help me out?
segments: Why didn't you say so earlier?
I’ll tell you what I know. It’s the least I can do.

dialogues.question: Can you tell me about the murderer?
segments: Reports I’ve seen detail the suspect as a mustached man.

dialogues.question: Any other defining features?
segments: Not that I can think of. He’s just an average Joe gone astray.

dialogues.question: What do you mean?
segments: The reports we’ve gotten imply the suspect dresses as a gay man, luring his targets.
He beats them on their home turf.
abbr: Killer poses as a gay man

dialogues.question: You’re saying the suspect’s targets frequent the gay bars?
segments: That’s correct. A lot of our eyewitnesses live in Westertown, which is close to a few gay bars.

characters.questionsTransition: This was productive. Time to move on.

outro.question: Thank you for your time.
segments: Glad to help. Oh, and one last thing. There have been false reports floating out there..

outro.question: What about them?
segments: Specifically about the suspect’s attire.
Some folks claim he’s dressed in tattered wear.
I know someone who saw otherwise.

outro.question: Noted. Who is this person?
segments: She lives in Westertown. Here’s the address and name.

characters.outroTransition: Looks like her name is Martha. I should go look for her.

characters.name: Witness
characters.introStart: Maybe she knows where Martha lives

intro.question: Pardon me. Do you know someone named Martha?
segments: Yes, she lives down the street. What do you need from her?

intro.question: I heard she knows about the murders around these parts?
segments: Oh, yes. She saw one of the murders right before her eyes. As did I.

characters.introTransition: It’s worth a try here. Let’s see if I can learn something new.

dialogues.question: Oh. Do you know what the murderer looked like?
segments: Uh, the guy was wearing a tattered brown shirt.
abbr: Witness claims murderer wore a tattered brown shirt

dialogues.question: Hmm, okay. How about any defining features. Say, a mustache?
segments: Defining features…um, he did have his curly mustache.
abbr: Witness claims suspect had a mustache

dialogues.question: Do you know of the victims? Anything at all?
segments: Yes… a good friend of mine fell victim to the savage killer. He… his wounds were deep.

dialogues.question: What kind of wounds if I may ask?
segments: I-I’m not entirely sure. Guns, perhaps?
abbr: Victims were allegedly suffered gunshot wounds

characters.questionsTransition: Hmm. It might be wise to make sure this information is accurate.

outro.question: Sorry for your loss, and stay strong. I appreciate the time.
segments: Thank you. If it helps get that beast behind bars, I will gladly lend my time..
